context: Dental Fillings,Dental Crowns,Dental Surgery,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Cleaning,
review: I'd definitely recommend him because hes got tons of patience to answer my 100s of queries. We were terrified when we heard that our baby should go under anesthesia for complete dental process. But hes there in every step of the way. We did pre anesthesia check up and once we got the clearance we proceeded with it. Now we dont have to worry about her dental health at all. I'm so glad that I came across this clinic.

Dr Naveen is an elegant dentist I've ever seen. Took my 5yr old daughter for check-up & treatment and guess what, she became a best friend of Dr Naveen. I'll recommend every parent who have toddlers or children to happily go ahead and visit the clinic for treatments without any second thought.
Thank you Dr Naveen for your exceptional skills in handling children with care.

Recently I visited this clinic for my kid teeth problem. The pediatric dentist here Dr Naveen Kumar reddy is very professional and friendly  while dealing with kids. He explained every thing about the treatment and care to be taken after the treatment. Clinic is hegeinic . I am fully satisfied with the treatment. My kid also very happy. Thank you Doctor.

First time I am visiting dental clinic and was terrified of dental equipment. Dr Naveen understood my situation and handled me with great care. He explained me nicely everything and made me feel relax. Got confidence after talking with him, he did deep cleaning and filling. Dr Naveen has great patience and gently he did everything, I didn't even feel a pinch of pain.
I highly recommend this dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Naveen is a fantastic doctor who is really an expert in treating kids. Our five year old daughter had to go for root canal treatment. We went to many doctors in Pune, all of them asked us to for general anesthesia for the kid. We were very much scared in giving general anesthesia for such a small kid. Finally we went to a famous paedodontist in a prime location in Pune, who took many visits without any positive result and again asked us to go for general anesthesia.  But Dr Naveen Reddy 
 in Hyderabad, with his expertise saved our daughter from GA and she was very much comfortable in getting the whole treatment done with just minimal visits.  We wholeheartedly thank Dr Naveen Reddy for the best treatment on a five year kid. Kid is happy after that without any complaints. Strongly recommend Dr Naveen for kids dental complaints.
reply_text: Your positive feedback is greatly appreciated. Your Review motivate us to provide all our patients with the best service possible. Thank you for recommending us to other patients.

I definitely recommend the anasuya's City smiles ðŸ˜Š
